overview: In this age, our future hides itself behind the outline of the present and is no longer visible, in the same way that Pikachu hides behind the flowerpot in the recent demo of Pokémon Go. Do we live in the past, the present or the future? Are we the back-up data of ourselves or data that is yet to be rendered? Every Smooth Thing Through Mesher, originally commissioned for the Gwangju Biennale 2018, is willing to raise these questions on a summer night waiting for a typhoon.
title: Every Smooth Thing Through Mesher
